Text:
Before she could even scream, Queen Reina is
decapitated. In the midst of the tumult, a man
suddenly appears.

I am Mordred, the Transcendent Knight and 9th member
of the Rounds. I believe you recognize my name,
Queen Oriana.
Now then, we can finally begin the ceremony—
for the succession of the key.

With those words, Mordred immediately takes out an
artifact and begins to manipulate it.

Then, Rose's ring shines and a pillar of light
reappears, stretching far into the sky.
What the...?!

The holder of the key and the user of the device
need not be the same. All that is required is that
the signal is properly delivered.

Before long, the surroundings are inexplicably dark,
and the sky is enveloped in darkness.

The inky blackness gnaws away at the sky itself.
Something vaguely resembling flower petals whirl
about its center.
This is...it can't be!

This is the reality of the legend. It was once used
to destroy 100,000 soldiers of the Velgalta Empire
in a single night...
The Black Rose.

It is the law of the Cult to eliminate all
witnesses.
I summon you, ruler of the Fourth Realm!
Ragnarok!
GYAAAAAAA!!!

Ragnarok appears and uses its immense magical power
to destroy the main street, civilians and all.

With a loud roar it spews flames from its mouth,
reducing everything to ash and dust, leaving no
trace of the people who were once there.
H-How...could this...
Heh heh heh... Let the slaughter begin...
Pulverize them! Demon King Ragnarok!

In the next moment, a flash of blue-violet light
rips through the darkness.
GYAAAA!!!

Its arm severed, Ragnarok utters a resounding,
guttural shriek.

Then, from the dark sky descends a man cloaked in a
jet-black long coat.
That's...!

A rose blooming in the sky, bats ablaze, and a band
of light calms the land... Each is an extraordinary
sight.
Damn—that thing's ugly.

You may have had the element of surprise, but it's
still impressive that you managed to wound
Ragnarok...
Who the hell are you?

We are the Shadow Garden. We lurk in the darkness
and hunt down shadows.
GUUUOOAAHH!!!

Regenerating its arm, Ragnarok lets out another
roar. As if in response, countless black blobs fall
from the center of the Black Rose and scream to life.

The jet-black beasts begin attacking people with
overwhelming force.
Th-There are so many of them!

However, in the next moment, the beasts are all
slain at once.

Shrouded in the darkness and cloaked in jet-black,
the girls hunt down the beasts. Rose is
particularly familiar with two of them.
Go.
*gasp*
You have something to do, don't you?
...Yes!

(Even at this very moment, those monsters are
spawning from the Black Rose one after the other...)

(The damage to the castle and the city is immense...
If I don't do something quickly, everyone will be
attacked by them.)
(I...I must fulfill my duty!)
